name: Wise Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Wise Trigger 节点。主要用于: Handle Wise events via webhooks

profileId.name: profileId
profileId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
profileId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Profile Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

event.name: event
available_options: Balance Credit (值: balanceCredit) - Triggered every time a balance account is credited
Balance Update (值: balanceUpdate) - Triggered every time a balance account is credited or debited
Transfer Active Case (值: transferActiveCases) - Triggered every time a transfer's list of active cases is updated
Transfer State Changed (值: tranferStateChange) - Triggered every time a transfer's status is updated
